info.title: Outbound Delivery (A2X)
info.description: This service enables you to create, read, update and delete outbound deliveries. It can be consumed in Fiori apps and on other user interfaces.

x-sap-shortText: Process outbound deliveries using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Delivery Processing Without Order Reference(1MI)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1MI " Link To BP ")
[Direct Procurement with Inbound Delivery(2TX)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2TX " Link To BP ")
[Delivery Insights Enabled by IoT(4IH)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/4IH " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Handling Unit (HANDLINGUNIT)
* Shipping: Delivery (LE_SHP_DELIVERY)
* Shipping: Delivery Item (LE_SHP_DELIVERYITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

tags.name: Outbound Delivery Maintenance Item Object Lists
Outbound Delivery Maintenance Item Object List Headers

post.description: Creates outbound delivery item texts using the delivery document, the delivery document item, the text element and the text language.

get.description: Reads all outbound delivery items. You can narrow down the result by specifying filter conditions.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

A_MaintenanceItemObject.title: Outbound Delivery Maintenance Item Object Lists

A_SerialNmbrDelivery.title: Outbound Delivery Maintenance Item Object List Headers

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

search.name: search
search.description: Search items by search phrases, see [Searching](https://wiki.scn.sap.com/wiki/display/EmTech/SAP+Annotations+for+OData+Version+2.0#SAPAnnotationsforODataVersion2.0-Query_Option_searchQueryOptionsearch)

A_OutbDeliveryItemOrderByOptions.name: $orderby
A_OutbDeliveryItemOrderByOptions.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

A_OutbDeliveryItemSelectOptions.name: $select
A_OutbDeliveryItemSelectOptions.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)
